div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 382 Greece, northern, 1934 (467) Burial: c. 350-340 B.C. (T) Contents: 25+ AR Perdiccas II: 2 st. (as Head, HN2 fig. 134) Amyntas II-III: 23+ st. (all very worn) Disposition: dispersed Information from an Athenian correspondent (no further details)
